title: Ranked LP
body: Can anyone tell me why it is that when I play a ranked game and win I get about 11 - 15 lp but when I lose I lose like 20-30....

replies.body:
Just like in every other thread like this:

Your MMR is lower than the current division you are in, so the system is trying to make you drop in rank until your MMR is average with your current division. If you go on a good win streak eventually you will even out your MMR and will gain and lose similar amounts of LP.

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1qm41u/a_true_look_at_mmr_and_league_placement/

This will explain everything you need to know and more.
ive been having the same problem

means we lost more games then we should have,  and are about to be demoted.   your gonna have to win streak like 10 games which is impossible.

I really don't like how the lp system works, starcraft is way better in that its hidden.
Its really not impossible, I was like 17-3 on my last 20 games when my MMR decayed from plat 3 to Gold 4 from not playing, then I was back to normal.

I believe it is because your MMR probably shows that you are ranked higher than your play indicates you should be. A while back I had a horribly round of luck and got demoted three ranks, at which point wins were giving me ~25LP and losses were hitting me for ~10LP. As I climbed back up the gap between them got smaller and now I earn ~20LP and lose ~15LP/
